chapter.title: Simple Table of States
chapter.subtitle: Display of the states table as a standard HTML table
chapter.abstract: Get started with an HTML table display of all rows of the states table contained in the example database, which is in SQLite format.

chapter.title: Users in cities assigned to a state
chapter.subtitle: Report that filters based on state lookup
chapter.abstract: Display a subset of rows in a table using a report parameter to specify the state of the rows to be displayed.

chapter.title: Master Summary with drill down
chapter.subtitle: A graph containing links to another drill down report and embedded calculations.
chapter.abstract: Graph with a related report with links back to the Report that filters based on state lookup. This report also demonstrates the use of calculation fields embedded in a report.

chapter.title: Master detail with nested blocks
chapter.subtitle: Display all users in each city of each state
chapter.abstract: Display a data block of states, whereas for each state another (nested) data block of cities should be shown also.

chapter.title: External SVG Graph Example
chapter.subtitle: An alternative for creating SVG graphs supported by older browsers
chapter.abstract: Graph created in a way that supports older browsers that do not support inline SVG.

chapter.title: Customized Simple Table of States
chapter.subtitle: Variation of the Simple Table of States report using a custom skin
chapter.abstract: Display the states table using a custom skin in which the dataTables jQuery plugin is enabled.

chapter.title: Sample State Graph
chapter.subtitle: Graph that can be referenced in another report
chapter.abstract: Graph that needs to be referenced in another report embedded in an object tag, to make it browser compatible.

chapter.title: SVG Graph Demo
chapter.subtitle: Preview of various graph types supported by SVG Graph
chapter.abstract: Various types of graphs, combined with all sorts of available graphing options.
